bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Disability Act 2005 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: Committee Stage
Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed)
Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Seanad Electoral (University Members) (Amendment) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the amendment of the Seanad Electoral (University Members) Acts 1937 to 2006, to provide for the provisions of the seventh amendment of Bunreacht na hÉireann and to extend the franchise of the university panel of Seanad Éireann to all people who are over eighteen and are holders of an appropriate third level qualification from an Irish Institute of Higher Education and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hAchtanna Toghcháin an tSeanaid (Comhaltaí Ollscoile), 1937 go 2006 a leasú, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le forálacha an seachtú leasú ar Bhunreacht na hÉireann agus chun toghchóras rolla ollscoile Sheanad Éireann a leathnú chuig na daoine go léir atá os cionn ocht mbliana déag agus ar sealbhóirí iad ar cháilíocht tríú leibhéal chuí ó Fhoras Ardoideachais in Éirinn agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) (Short Term Lettings) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Act 2000, to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Amendment) (Short Term Lettings) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) (Ligin Ghearrthéarma), 2017
